AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Milira Metropolis Child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] endured her simple and uneventful childhood in Cradol.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Milira Young Earth Traveler
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] came to the ground at an early age. As the sentences of the elders telling the dangers of the ground, [PAWN_nameDef] always traveled with her identity concealed.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Milira Slacker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] didnâ€™t move. As all the housework done by Milian, [PAWN_nameDef] shall do nothing. With the situation continuing, [PAWN_nameDef] sometimes would think that, she would find her interests one day maybe.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Milira Academy Student
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] studied in the academy for long, where she snatch a glimpse of the vast ocean of knowledge.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Milira Rebellious Child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] went to the ground in objection to the persuading of the elders after a plain and tedious time in Cradol. How curious a kid.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Milira Bookworm
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spoiled all days in the library, trying to read the abstruse sentences on most of the books.
